name: Party People (Dovii, MikkMunk, kidkamandi, Ida Lønborg, Kristinn)
name_original: Party People (Dovii, MikkMunk, kidkamandi, Ida Lønborg, Kristinn)
description:
When your friends can't make your birthday party...
TRY MAKING UP YOUR FRIENDS!

Game jam themes:
     - White Noise (Sound)
     - FOMO (Emotion)
     - Vibrations (Mechanic)

All of the in-game assets are made by our 6-man team.

Make sure to play the game with SOUND ON :)
